author: Author Name
text:
The example blog post would be here.

Notice that the first line (everything preceding the first newline mark) in this file is the string which will be appended to your blog url to retrieve the blog post. That is, if your blog's url is simondavidpratt.com/blog.html, then to access this post the url would be simondavidpratt.com/blog.html#example-url

The second line is the date as a string (in whatever format you like)

The third line is the author's name.

The fourth line is a space separated list of tags which can be used to index your blog posts.
title: First Example Title
blurb: Example blurb goes here to provide a preview of the blog post in a few words. May contain HTML markup!
